channel.title: Wayland's Scriptorium
channel.description: This is Wayland's website. It links to his main areas of focus (see links), and also functions as a blog for his other thoughts and ideas.

item.title: The Perfect Desk
item.description: The Perfect Desk -- an ideal to strive for

item.title: Raku: Your First Language?
item.description: We've often said that raku should be the last language that people learn, but ... what if it should be the first?

item.title: Raku: Both RPG and Guild
item.description: The Raku community is like a Famtasy Role-playing Game. Find out what kind of wizard you are, and what your place is in the projects you and we are working on

item.title: ASV: A New File Format
item.description: Is CSV good but not quite good enough? How about ASV? Unfamiliar with ASV? Read on!
